title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 46 x 87 cm (18 1/8 x 34 1/4 in.)
description: Central medallion showing a giraffe being led by two turbaned figures with elaborate foliage all around the medallion. In brown on off-white.

Textile, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
